:py:mod:`napi.data.report`
==========================

.. py:module:: napi.data.report

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Module for easy report generation and data summary.



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   napi.data.report.Report




.. py:class:: Report

   Representation of report for data.

   .. py:method:: generate()

      Generate report.

      Provides ability to generate report at subject or dataset level.
